com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class ConfigurationComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.ConfigurationComponent

  • public class ConfigurationComponent
extends java.lang.Object
    This component defines the configuration for a given service. Services will generally extend this component, add their own

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationComponent

        public ConfigurationComponent(ZooKeeperConfigurationComponent zkFactory,
                              MetricRegistry metricRegistry)
        Note that this takes in a ZookeeperConfigurationComponent even though it doesn't use it directly. That's to make sure that ZooKeeperConfigurationComponent has been constructed before this; it will modify the static ConfigurationManager, which this class will use.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                  java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Get the value of the property with the given key, or defaultValue if not set. In most cases, you shouldn't need to use this method. You can instead annotate fields with @Configuration and let the system bind the property for you automatically.
        Parameters:
        key - cannot be null
        defaultValue - default value if key is not set; can be null.

      • getConfiguration

        public AggregatedConfiguration getConfiguration()
        Return the whole configuration. Note that if you just need to get or set a property, use the direct getter and setter methods instead.

      • split

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> split(java.lang.String value)
        Uses the splitter returned by getSplitter() to split the given value into a list. Handles nulls.
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:

      • getPropertyFromConfigurations

        public static <T> T getPropertyFromConfigurations(java.lang.String key,
                                                  T defValue,
                                                  org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration... configs)
        Returns the value of specified key in the first configuration in which it is found and non-null. If it is not found in any configuration, it returns defValue instead. Note that if a property exists in a configuration but the value is null, this method will not return null; it will keep trying the next configuration.
